column1: The Pit Room////The food is DEFINITELY delicious
column2: it is definitely delicious. The workers here seemed very enthused about working and being here. The vibe is warm and cozy
column3: it doesn't take many people to make the line go out the door
column4: so when it's very busy you can find yourself waiting outside. The line moves very quick though
column6: there is extra seating next door in "The patio". I feel like the prices per portion however are slightly inflated due to the neighboring neighborhoods
column8: just that for a cheaper price and not much change in taste
column9: you can go somewhere else. You won't be upset here at all however
column10: I would recommend The Pit Room if you are in the area.
